name: Escape From Batcatraz
description:
A local multiplayer game for two, where one player controls a hare that can jump, while the other controls a bat that can make sonar waves to reveal deadly platforms.

Use XBOX controllers for Windows.

BAT controls:
Left analog to steer.
B to screech!

HARE controls:
Left analog to steer.
B to jump!

Escape From Batcatraz was made at Nordic Game Jam 2017.

By: Joe, Basse, Emil, Mark and Jesper.
